ALL PEOPLE IN COMP IS TOXIC AND I AM A SUPREME MOTHER RUSSIAN PLAYER. thats what everyone acts like, all acts like they are russians which is boring after a while its a trend in csgo. another trend here is buying cases and getting all the shtty stuff from it 0.00001% chance of getting a knife in a case gl with getting that my friends. I enjoyed this game otherwise i wouldnt have done the thumbs up, I recomend this game to others because i loved it.

El juego esta bueno, llevo casi 3 meses (soy usuario nuevo) y la verdad tienes sus cosas buenas y malas.
